lessons.japanese: この線の終点はどこですか。
lessons.english: Where is the end of this line?

lessons.japanese: この路線の終点はどこでしょうか？
lessons.english: Where is the end of this line?

lessons.japanese: 車がいかれるかと思ったころ終点に着きました。
lessons.english: We reached our destination just as I thought the car was going to give up the ghost.

lessons.japanese: 東海道線は東京が終点だ。
lessons.english: The Tokaido line terminates at Tokyo.

lessons.japanese: 東海道線は東京が終点だ。
lessons.english: The final stop of Tokaido line is Tokyo.

lessons.japanese: この線の終点はどこですか。
lessons.english: Where is the end of this line?

lessons.japanese: 東海道線は東京が終点だ。
lessons.english: The Tokaido line terminates at Tokyo.

lessons.japanese: 車がいかれるかと思ったころ終点に着きました。
lessons.english: We reached our destination just as I thought the car was going to give up the ghost.

lessons.japanese: 東海道線は東京が終点だ。
lessons.english: The final stop of Tokaido line is Tokyo.

lessons.japanese: 終点でバスを降りました。
lessons.english: I got off the bus at the end of the line.

lessons.japanese: この路線の終点はどこでしょうか？
lessons.english: Where is the end of this line?

lessons.japanese: この路線は始発から終点まで約４５分です。
lessons.english: This train line is about 45 minutes from one end of the line to the other.

lessons.japanese: この路線は始発から終点まで約４５分です。
lessons.english: This train line is about 45 minutes from one end of the line to the other.
We'll get off at the last station.
We'll get off at the last stop.
